entries.Rainy_Day_0: On rainy days my thoughts always drift toward cinnamon and cookies.#$e#Why don't we bake some cookies together?$h
entries.Rainy_Day_1: Good morning, honey. I got up early and brewed us some coffee. [395] #$e#It's nice to drink something warm on days like this.$h
entries.Rainy_Day_2: It's raining outside. Make sure you don't catch a cold, honey.$3#$e#Stay indoors as much as possible. I really worry about you!$3
entries.Rainy_Day_3: Good morning! I woke up early from the sound of the rain and made you some breakfast. [194 195 210 211 216]  #$e#Stay warm and don't work too hard. I want you to stay healthy.$h
entries.Rainy_Day_4: On days like this, I love to curl up with a good book.#$e#If you'd like to, we could also snuggle up in a blanket together.$l
entries.patio_Penny: #$c .5#Ah! I was so engrossed in my book that I didn't even hear you coming.$h#$e#This place is always so peaceful. I'm very happy here.#$e#Thank you for everything, @. I love you.$l
entries.Rainy_Night_0: How was your day, honey? I spent my afternoon reading a novel.#$e#Let's head to bed early tonight, okay?#$b#You look cold, so I'll help warm you up.$l
entries.Rainy_Night_1: I'm sure Mom's at the saloon about now... But I don't feel so bad about it anymore. It's out of my hands.#$e#Here and now, you're my top priority. Let's go to bed soon, honey.$l
entries.Rainy_Night_2: I made soup for dinner tonight. Here, have some. [199 218 219 727 730] $h#$e#You need something hot on a day like this.#$b#... Even though you are plenty hot already.$l#$e#I don't know why I just said that. I'm so embarrassed right now!$h
entries.Rainy_Night_3: The sound of rain used to bother me, when I lived in that old metal trailer. But it's quite soothing here.#$e#So many things have changed because of you. I just feel so happy.$h
entries.Rainy_Night_4: Good evening, honey. I felt like making a nice dinner. I hope you like it. [212 214 225 209 200] $h
entries.Indoor_Day_0: It's so peaceful here. I used to have the most horrific nightmares, but now I sleep like a baby.#$e#It's all thanks to you being by my side. I love you, @.$l
entries.Indoor_Day_1: Good morning, @! I made you a hot breakfast. [195 210 211] #$e#It's important to me that you leave here with a full belly.$h
entries.Indoor_Day_2: Sometimes I wish we both had more days off and could just stay in together all day.#$e#What would we do? I can think of a few things.$l
entries.Indoor_Day_3: Good morning, honey. You look as beautiful as always today.$h#$e#Just so you know, I'm never going to let go of you.$l
entries.Indoor_Day_4: Ah... You're so pretty I forgot what I was going to say...$l#$e#Sometimes I feel like my heart will burst with all the longing and excitement I feel when I think of you.$l
entries.Indoor_Night_0: Good evening, honey. Did you accomplish everything you wanted to today?#$e#If not, that's okay. We've got all the time in the world!$h
entries.Indoor_Night_1: Hmm... skirt or pants tomorrow? Oh, who am I kidding... I always go with the skirt.#$e#Anyway, it's bedtime, honey. I can't wait to snuggle up under the covers.$h
entries.Indoor_Night_2: Oh, you're home! How was your day, honey?$h#$e#Mine was good, but a little lonely. I'm glad you're back.#$e#I think it's official. I can't live my life without you anymore!$h
entries.Indoor_Night_3: Mom's probably pretty lonely now that I'm gone. I just hope she doesn't visit the saloon more to make up for it.#$e#You shouldn't feel bad! Mom has to solve her own problems.
entries.Indoor_Night_4: Ready to tuck in? I made the bed and everything...#$e#Also, um... how about letting me massage your back today? I bought some oils...$l
entries.Outdoor_0: I only ever dreamed of living in such a beautiful place, and now it's come true.#$e#I can't express into words how much you mean to me.$l
entries.Outdoor_1: Isn't this a perfect place to raise children?#$e#I would've been so happy growing up on a farm.
entries.Outdoor_2: Hi, honey! How about a healthy snack to stay energized? [613 398 634] $h#$e#If I knew more about farm work I'd help you out more. Sorry!
entries.Outdoor_3: I just saw a songbird flying due west. In Stardew Valley that's a very good omen.$h
entries.Outdoor_4: Ahh... It feels great to be outside. I could spend all day right here, observing every little thing.#$e#Just look at %pet strolling around the farm. Isn't this pure bliss?$h
entries.OneKid_0: Have you had any time to play with %kid1 today? Maybe a second child will make things better.
entries.OneKid_1: Little %kid1 is going to have such a great childhood here.
entries.OneKid_3: I feel a lot older now that we have a child. Maybe it's just this new responsibility weighing on me.#$e#It's not bad! I've wanted this for a long time.
entries.OneKid_4: I wanted a child for a very long time. %kid1 is like a blessing to me.#$e#You are too, honey.$h
entries.TwoKids_0: I already gave %kid1 and %kid2 their food. They're such hungry children!
entries.TwoKids_1: We have to make sure and give %kid1 a lot of attention now that we have %kid2. We don't want any jealousy between them.
entries.TwoKids_2: I've had this dream that %kid2 grew wings and flew into the night sky. What does it mean?
entries.TwoKids_3: A nice house, two wonderful kids, and a beautiful plot of land. We're so very fortunate.
entries.Good_0: I love you so much, @.$l#$b#Thank you for being with me.$h
entries.Good_1: I had dreams of marrying you for such a long time.$l#$b#I still can't believe they all came true.$h
entries.Good_2: I knew you were the one from the moment you moved here...$l
entries.Good_3: Wow, you look incredibly beautiful today!$l#$e#I am so blessed to have you, @.$l
entries.Good_4: I just wanted to say thank you for being you.#$e#You bring a smile to my face every day.$h
entries.Good_5: Wow, you smell so good today, honey.$l#$e#So natural and captivating...$l
entries.Good_6: You are the best thing that ever happened to me, @.#$e#I promise I'll love you till the end of time.$l
entries.Good_7: I was just admiring the mermaid's pendant you gave me... I'll proudly wear this to my grave.
entries.Good_8: I love being around you, @. You bring out the best in me.$h#$e#I'm never going to leave your side.$l
entries.Good_9: @, you mean so much to me. I love you from the bottom of my heart.$l#$e#You're my everything, and I'm yours forever.$l
entries.funLeave_Penny: #$c .5#Rise and shine! You look lovely today.$h#$e#I'm going to head into town today, just for fun. I'll be back in a while!#$e#See you later, honey. I love you.$l
entries.funReturn_Penny: I had a nice time... It's good to stay in contact with everyone. Tell me about your day.
entries.jobLeave_Penny: #$c .5#Good morning! Did you sleep well?$h#$b#I have to go into town today. Don't work too hard, and eat something good for lunch!#$e#See you tonight, honey. I'll be thinking of you.$l
entries.jobReturn_Penny: #$c .5#Good evening, honey. How was your day?.#$e#Jas and Vincent weren't behaving very well today. I'm still all wound up...$3#$e#Well, it's time to unwind and relax now.$h#$b#I'm just looking forward to bedtime with you.$l
entries.spring_1: We've got a long, warm year to look forward to. Let's make it a productive one.
entries.spring_8: Spring is probably my favorite season. There's a certain freshness in the air that fills me with hope.
entries.spring_12: Oh, it's a festival tomorrow, isn't it? Large crowds, activities... *gulp*$s#$e#I'm so glad I'm going to have you by my side, honey.$h
entries.spring_15: Ah, the 'spring cleaning'... I'm actually going to enjoy this.
entries.spring_23: W...Will you dance with me at the festival tomorrow, honey?$3#$e#It's always a little embarrassing, so I'm really glad you are with me.$h
entries.summer_1: Summer may be searing hot, but the humidity feels great on the skin.
entries.summer_2: In summer, the ants become very active. I could watch them for hours... they have a pretty complex civilization from the looks of it!
entries.summer_5: Make sure you don't get a heat stroke, honey.$3#$e#Drink plenty of water and don't overwork yourself.
entries.summer_8: Sorry if I smell... I was sweating all night in the heat.$3#$e#On the contrary, you smell as alluring as ever.$l
entries.summer_10: Have you thought about what you're going to put in the luau soup?#$e#I'm fully confident that you'll choose something great.$h
entries.summer_15: It's midsummer... the mosquitoes are getting worse lately.#$e#Don't worry, I'll take care of them.
entries.summer_17: *phew*... I need to eat more melon to combat this heat!#$e#Or perhaps you'd like to rub my body with some ice cubes to cool it down?$l#$e#Why did I say this? Now I feel even hotter than before!$h
entries.fall_1: Fall... It makes me think of colored paper and glue. Maybe I'm spending too much time with the children.$h
entries.fall_2: It's my birthday today, but we don't have to do anything special.#$b#Every day I spend with you is already like a gift to me.$h
entries.fall_5: The smell of fall reminds me of the smell of books... weird, isn't it?
entries.fall_8: Winter's just around the corner. We need to double check the heating system, turn off the valves, and check all the insulation in the house.#$e#Don't worry about a thing, I'll take care of it all!$h
entries.fall_15: Have you figured out what you're going to use for our grange display tomorrow?#$e#I know you'll make the right choice, because you always do.$h#$b#I love you, @.$l
entries.fall_26: I'm not sure if I'm brave enough to enter the maze at the Spirit's Eve festival tomorrow night...$3#$e#Maybe if you hold my hand, @. I always feel more courageous when I'm with you.$h
entries.winter_1: Winter's a good time to unwind a bit. You deserve it after the long year!
entries.winter_3: How will we stay afloat this winter?$3#$b#Oh, you don't have to tell me. I trust you to make the right decisions.$h#$e#Maybe I'll just be happy to get more of you to myself for a while.$l
entries.winter_5: The falling snow reminds me of grandma, rocking by the fire.#$b#I mostly remember her shadow flickering against the orange wood. That was long ago.
entries.winter_7: The Festival of Ice is tomorrow. I'll cheer for you as loud as I can at the fishing contest!$h
entries.winter_12: Winter has a quiet and romantic feel to it, doesn't it? The snow is beautiful...#$b#Although not as beautiful as you are, honey.$l
entries.winter_24: Are you excited about the gift exchange tomorrow?#$e#I'll be crossing my fingers you'll get something nice.$h
entries.winter_28: The year is almost over...$3#$e#Time really flies when you spend it with the one you love.$h
